column4: A good trick to open your own backups (ending in only .conf, the automation adds more) do gedit /etc/X11/*.conf
I never touched VIM.  I'll try it.
This update speed is rediculous lol.
Imagine everyone running windows downloading 2 gigs at the same time on the same server.
I know it should be slow, I just think it's cool how official ubuntu is.  50 kb/s.
How you change where you dl from?
If anyone thinks im complaining im not, lol.  Its my third day in ubuntu and I like it.
system, software sources.. there's a menu option in synaptic too..
it will tell you to update when you click ok
I think it's supposed to have "better" wifi.. don't know if you can call it "good" yet
I think you'll have to ask google
last I heard it was "coming when it's done"
nah.. transferring files is still a kludge.. if it even works
and no, you don't have to run 32 bit firefox
